text: Randi Weingarten (born December 18, 1957)Who's Who in America, 2007. is an American labor leader, attorney, and educator. She was born in New York City. She is president of the American Federation of Teachers (AFT) and a member of the AFLâ€“CIO.Chan, Sewell, "Teachers' Union Chief Discusses Gay Identity", The New York Times, October 12, 2007. She is the former president of the United Federation of Teachers. Weingarten is openly lesbian. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:Educators from New York City Category:Lesbians Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:LGBT people from New York City Category:LGBT businesspeople
title: Randi Weingarten
